message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $950,000 for your product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $950,000 is still a bit below what I'm looking for. I'm willing to come down to $975,000.  This is a fair price considering the value this product brings to you. Let's close this deal!
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $960,000 for your product. I believe this is a fair compromise given its value to me.
